document.heading: Board of Education Capital Construction Contracting Authority Act of 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-143, the “Board of Education Capital Construction Contracting Authority Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-504, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 27, 1990, and April 10, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 26, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-199 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
